QuestData.Title: Mor'shan Caravan Pick-Up
QuestData.Description: The battle in Ashenvale rages on without relent. Our forces at the Mor'shan Ramparts are in desperate need of reinforcements and supplies.$B$BWe have a major shipment of medicines and food headed north, and I need a capable $c like you to guard it.$B$BRocco Whipshank waits for you at the road north out of the Crossroads. Let him know you are ready to accompany the caravan.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Rocco Whipshank and ride north with the Mor'shan Caravan.
QuestData.RewardText: This is terrible news! $n, at least you arrived safely.
